comment: If any representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` has a certain property ` ps ` , then the ordered pair ` <. V , E >. ` of the set of vertices and the set of edges (which is such a representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` ) has this property. (Contributed by AV, 11-Oct-2020.)
